segments.text: Oh, this scene is just so amusing to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on drying that plate, she doesn't even notice the sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're being so sneaky, trying to get some cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they've been doing this without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is just adding to the chaos, but they seem completely unfazed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening, it'll be quite the surprise for her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just so full of little details that make it quite entertaining to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
